```{r,echo=F,results='asis'}

flv = c("\\sqrt{x}","\\sqrt[3]{x}","x^3","2^{x}","\\log_{2}\\left(x\\right)","x^2")
flh = c("\\sqrt{x}","\\sqrt[3]{x}","\\left(x\\right)^3","2^{x}","\\log_{2}\\left(x\\right)","\\left(x\\right)^2")

fs = list(function(x){sqrt(x)},
          function(x){sign(x)*abs(x)^(1/3)},
          function(x){x^3},
          function(x){2^x},
          function(x){log2(x)},
          function(x){x^2})

xas = list(NA,NA,NA,c(-10,10),c(0,0),NA)
yas = list(NA,NA,NA,c(0,0),c(-10,10),NA)

xls = list(seq(0,12,0.01),
           seq(-12,12,0.01), 
           seq(-3,3,0.01),
           seq(-12,4,0.01),
           seq(0.0001,10.0001,0.01),
           seq(-4,4,0.01))
xps = list(c(0,1,4,9),
           c(-8,-1,0,1,8),
           c(-3,-2,-1,0,1,2,3),
           c(0,1,2,3),
           c(1,2,4,8),
           c(-3,-2,-1,0,1,2,3))
yls = list()
yps = list()
for(i in 1:6){
    yls[[i]] = fs[[i]](xls[[i]])
    yps[[i]] = fs[[i]](xps[[i]])
}

# ord1 = c(sample(c(1,4,5),2),sample(c(1:6,2,3,6),8))


for(i in 1:6){
    ord1 = rep(i,10)
    xl = list()
    yl = list()
    xp = list()
    yp = list()
    xa = list()
    ya = list()
    
    # vr, hr, l, r, u, d, hst, hsh, vst, vsh
    tex1 = paste0("y=-",flv[ord1[1]])
    
    tex2 = paste0("y=",gsub("x","-x",flh[ord1[2]],fixed=T))
    
    tex3 = paste0("y=",gsub("x","x+2",flh[ord1[3]],fixed=T))
    
    tex4 = paste0("y=",gsub("x","x-2",flh[ord1[4]],fixed=T))
    
    tex5 = paste0("y=",flv[ord1[5]],"+2")
    
    tex6 = paste0("y=",flv[ord1[6]],"-2")
    
    tex7 = paste0("y=",gsub("x","\\frac{x}{2}",flh[ord1[7]],fixed=T))
    
    tex8 = paste0("y=",gsub("x","2x",flh[ord1[8]],fixed=T))
    
    tex9 = paste0("y=2\\cdot ",flv[ord1[9]])
    
    tex10 = paste0("y=\\frac{",flv[ord1[10]],"}{2}")
    
    texes = c(tex1,tex2,tex3,tex4,tex5,tex6,tex7,tex8,tex9,tex10)
    
    
    ach = c("vertical reflection over $x$ axis. $(a,b)\\to(a,-b)$",
            "horizontal reflection over $y$ axis. $(a,b)\\to(-a,b)$",
            "translation left by distance 2. $(a,b)\\to(a-2,b)$",
            "translation right by distance 2. $(a,b)\\to(a+2,b)$",
            "translation up by distance 2. $(a,b)\\to(a,b+2)$",
            "translation down by distance 2. $(a,b)\\to(a,b-2)$",
            "horizontal stretch by factor 2. $(a,b)\\to(2a,b)$",
            "horizontal shrink by factor 2. $(a,b)\\to(\\frac{a}{2},b)$",
            "vertical stretch by factor 2. $(a,b)\\to(a,2b)$",
            "vertical shrink by factor 2. $(a,b)\\to(a,\\frac{b}{2})$"
            )
    
    cat("## Parent is $b=")
    cat(gsub("x","a",flv[i],fixed=T))
    cat("$\n\n")
    
    for(j in 1:10){
        cat(paste0("$",texes[j],"$ is graphed by "))
        cat(ach[j])
        cat("\n\n")
    }
    
}
```
